rules.natural: Whenever facility1 produces substance1, substance1 is not approved.
Whenever disease1 is fatal, disease1 spreads.
If organization1 has lax regulations, then in the event of an outbreak of disease1, disease1 is fatal.
Either organization1 has lax regulations or facility1 is understaffed.
Given that an audit is scheduled for facility1, if facility1 is understaffed, then any outbreak of disease1 will result in disease1 being fatal.
If worker1 has skill1, then worker1 is a member of organization1.
Whenever worker1 operates equipment1, then if facility1 produces substance1, substance1 is approved.
If worker1 is a member of organization1, then worker1 operates equipment1.
Whenever substance1 is effective, substance1 treats disease1.
Provided that substance1 is safe, substance1 is effective.
If it is not the case that substance1 being tested implies substance1 is safe, then substance1 is recalled.
If it is not the case that the failure of facility1 being compliant to lead to substance1 being contaminated implies process1 is not approved, then there is an outbreak of disease1.
Under the condition that it is not the case that facility1 not being compliant leads to substance1 being contaminated, substance1 is tested.
If it is not the case that facility1 not being compliant implies substance1 is contaminated, then process1 is approved.
Whenever facility1 is not compliant, facility1 produces substance1.
Provided that facility1 is not compliant, substance1 is not contaminated.

facts.natural: An audit is scheduled for facility1.

steps.natural: Under the condition that worker1 has skill1, worker1 operates equipment1.
Provided that worker1 has skill1, if facility1 produces substance1, then substance1 is approved.
If facility1 produces substance1, then substance1 is approved.
It is not the case that facility1 produces substance1.
Under the condition that substance1 is tested, substance1 is safe.
Under the condition that facility1 not being compliant does not lead to substance1 being contaminated, substance1 is safe.
If it is not the case that facility1 not being compliant implies substance1 is contaminated, then substance1 is effective.
Provided that facility1 not being compliant does not lead to substance1 being contaminated, substance1 treats disease1.
If facility1 is not compliant, then substance1 is contaminated.
If facility1 is understaffed, then should an outbreak of disease1 happen, disease1 will be fatal.
If an outbreak of disease1 occurs, then disease1 is fatal.
Provided that there is an outbreak of disease1, disease1 spreads.
There is no outbreak of disease1.
If it is not the case that facility1 not being compliant leads to substance1 being contaminated, then process1 is not approved.
If facility1 is not compliant, then substance1 is contaminated.
